title: Opinion on novel coronavirus COVID-19 as a health issue India 2020
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing Response, and a y axis representing Share of respondents.
The highest category is found at Staying_alert_and_taking_precautions where Share of respondents is 72.0.
The lowest category is found at Don't_know_much_about_coronavirus where Share of respondents is 3.0.

data.Response: Don't believe it can impact us or Indians at large
Don't believe it can impact us
